name: The Entrance to Tokoyo
desc: After passing through The Moon-Bathed Deep, you come to a land that is foreign to you. You see no sign of any civilization at all, and so you decide to investigate further.

customize.text:
<color=#ece5d8>Enkanomiya, Inazuma</color>
<color=#ffffff>Quest Introduction:</color> <color=#ffffff>After passing through The Moon-Bathed Deep, you come to a land that is foreign to you. You see no sign of any civilization at all, and so you decide to investigate further.</color>
Quest Objective: Go deeper into the cave
<color=#ffffff>Paimon:</color> Phew, it sure took a while before we saw anything resembling civilization. Let's get closer and have a look.
Quest Objective: Go to the building up ahead
<color=#ffffff>Paimon:</color> The five symbols on this big door must be the Key Sigils.
<color=#ffffff>Paimon:</color> Let's have a look around. From what we've experienced in the past, we'll probably need to do something else first.
Quest Objective: Investigate the nearby area and search for clues
Quest Objective: Investigate the mechanism and activate the gate
Quest Objective: Examine the great gate and look for a way to progress
<color=#ffffff>Paimon:</color> Seems like there's something else visible through this door. Is it a path? Or is it a trap that'll make us bump into a wall?
Quest Objective: Investigate the hidden path
<color=#ffffff>Paimon:</color> Huh, so there really was a path here. Enkanomiya is such a mysterious place.
Quest Objective: Go to the door
Quest Objective: Use the Key of the Moon-Bathed Deep to open the door
<color=#ffffff>Paimon:</color> Looks like this is where we need to use the Key of the Moon-Bathed Deep.
Quest Objective: Open the door
<color=#ffffff>Paimon:</color> Wow! Paimon never thought that there'd be such a huge place underneath Watatsumi Island!
<color=#ffffff>Paimon:</color> Looks like our goal is that place in the middle.
<color=#ffffff>Paimon:</color> Alrighty then, Traveler. Let's head in. Steadily now...
<color=#ffffff>Paimon:</color> Those ruins seem to be closer to us. Let's start there!
<color=#ffffff>Paimon:</color> Buildings means people... once upon a time, anyway. And where there's people, there'll be writing!
<color=#ffffff>Paimon:</color> And where there's writing and paper, there'll be those... hints that we can't even read.

customize.name: From Dusk to Dawn in Byakuyakoku
customize.desc: A World Quest series with Enjou, a researcher, to investigate Enkanomiya in search for the Bloodbranch Coral.

customize.name: The Entrance to Tokoyo
customize.desc: After passing through The Moon-Bathed Deep, you come to a land that is foreign to you. You see no sign of any civilization at all, and so you decide to investigate further.

customize.name: The Trail of Drake and Serpent
customize.desc: You decide to head to the Evernight Temple to search for the fragment of the Reins of Revival

customize.name: Dreams in the Gaps
customize.desc: You decide to head to Serpent's Heart to search for the fragment of the Reins of Revival

customize.name: Adventure EXP
customize.desc: Adventure EXP. Used to improve Adventure Rank.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Hero's Wit
customize.desc:
Character EXP material. Gives 20000 EXP.
These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Achievements</color>
Flowing Sunfire, Also Known as Marishi

Go deeper into the cave
Go to the building up ahead
Investigate the nearby area and search for clues (0/5)
Investigate the mechanism and activate the gate
Examine the great gate and look for a way to progress
Investigate the hidden path
Go to the door
Use the Key of the Moon-Bathed Deep to open the door
Open the door
